metadata.description: A new kind of werewolf tale from the creators behind SORE THUMBS and LAST BLOOD! Teenage loser Landon was born into this magical modern era where geeks and nerds are considered "cool"... too bad he's too dim-witted to even be considered a geek or a nerd! Landon's only joy in life is spending time with man's best friend, a frisbee-catching champion canine named Barker. That all changes one night in the woods when Landon's beloved dog is bitten by a werewolf, transforming him into... a human teenager!
metadata.name: Barker
